divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my friends house outside having a smoke at around 2am and just talki.g just usual. I looked up to the stars like I always do to look for shooting stars when i seen four lights going across the sky simultaniously and they were sort of twisti.g in the sky kind of. My instand reaction was that it was a ufo and i got really scared and and couldnt believe i just seen it! And then my friend proceeds to tell me that aparently if you see one it means your going to get abducted and now im terrified to go to sleep and im so scared, im panicing and i dont know what to do!
Summary: four lights twisting simaltaniously in sky
